value.title: Power BI Relationships: Step-by-Step Example (Slightly Advanced)
value.excerpt: In this real-world example, we create a model to find matching blood donors. This shows you step-by-step how I draft the model and relationships (on paper first) and then bring it to life in Power BI. value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Intro to Tabular Editor
value.excerpt: Tabular Editor is an incredible Tool that enables users to manipulate a Tabular Model at lighting speeds.  Daniel Otykier is the creator of Tabular Editor.  This video will explain the basic functionalities of the program.    Watch the full Series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn1m_aBmgsbGvz4SsmO_fkeThjDUSWFkf
